Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 23 Sanidassanasappaṭighattika » 23.7 Pañhāvāra » 23.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Sanidassanasappaṭighattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
64.
3095Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe satta, naadhipatiyā satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, naaññamaññe satta, naupanissaye satta, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte satta…pe…  nasampayutte satta, navippayutte ekaṃ, nonatthiyā satta, novigate satta.
<< 23.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīyaup Hetusāmaññaghaṭanā >>
